name: One
info: Test: Upcoming event. Checks future event handling and rendering.

name: Two
info: Test: Event in the near future. Ensure sorting works for upcoming events.

name: Three
info: Test: Past event. Ensures expired events are shown at the bottom with reduced opacity.

name: Four
info: Test: Mid-term event. Ensures events are properly sorted by date and time.

name: Five
info: Test: Far future event. Verifies proper display of distant events in the table.

name: Six
info: Test: Upcoming event. Verifies future event is listed above past events.

name: Seven
info: Test: Past event. Checks how the system handles events that occurred in the past.

name: Eight
info: Test: Sorting functionality. Confirms sorting of upcoming events based on date and time.

name: Nine
info: Test: Long-term future event. Verifies events far in the future are correctly ordered.

name: Ten
info: Test: Event with no info. Ensures events without a description are displayed correctly.

name: Eleven
info: Test: Event with multiple fields. Verifies handling of various time slots and info fields.

name: Twelve
info: Test: Event in December. Verifies events in different months are sorted properly.

name: Thirteen
info: Test: Weekend event. Verifies sorting and display of weekend events correctly.

name: Fourteen
info: Test: Event in the afternoon. Ensures events at different times are sorted properly.

name: Fifteen
info: Test: Event with generic description. Verifies handling of event info field.

name: Sixteen
info: Test: Evening event. Verifies sorting of events by time of day.

name: Seventeen
info: Test: Early morning event. Verifies sorting and display of events by time.

name: Eighteen
info: Test: Event with short duration. Verifies correct handling of events with different lengths.

name: Nineteen
info: Test: Event that already passed. Verifies correct styling for past events (semi-transparent).

name: Twenty
info: Test: Evening event. Verifies the sorting of evening events after other events.

name: Semester start
info: Fall 2024 semester starting day
